results.content: The information on the setup was very helpful however there were moments during the class, such as the group setup, where the sign up was not as up to date as it is today but I managed to work past it.

results.content: This course is useful for mobile and web developers trying to leverage power of cloud.

results.content:
Bought this course to learn about AWS Cognito and so far the course promises to learn every AWS service in-depth by the end of the course. This is not possible in ~2h which the course length.

Some details seem plain wrong. Also the course (as stated) is advertised as a Amazon Cognito course and barely has content about it.
results.content_html:
Bought this course to learn about AWS Cognito and so far the course promises to learn every AWS service in-depth by the end of the course. This is not possible in ~2h which the course length.

Some details seem plain wrong. Also the course (as stated) is advertised as a Amazon Cognito course and barely has content about it.
